40000601.Chinese_Text:
(拼尽全力 
 来一场精彩的比赛吧!)

40000606.English_Text: Here, you can check which <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</> you have equipped, meow!
40000606.Chinese_Text: 在这里可以查看配戴的灵魂喵！

40000607.English_Text: And if you click here, meow...

40000608.English_Text: (Now, should I move to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>square</> and meet the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>?)

40000609.Original_Text: 아, 잠깐만! 우리가 벌써\n달성한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>업적</>이 있다는 거\n알고 있었어?
40000609.English_Text: Wait! Did you know we already accomplished a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Goal</>?
40000609.Chinese_Text:
啊，等等！你知道
我们已经达成了
成就吗？

40000610.Original_Text: 네가 이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여정</>을 통해 이룬 것들은\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>업적</>에서 확인할 수 있어!
40000610.English_Text: You can check all your achievements <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>here</> in <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Goals</>!
40000610.Chinese_Text:
你可以在成就页面里可以查看
旅程中达成的成就！

40000611.Original_Text: 우리가 함께한 첫 업적이야!\n참, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>보상</>도 잊지 말고 챙기라구!
40000611.English_Text: This is the first Goal we completed together. Oh, don't forget to pick up your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>reward</>.
40000611.Chinese_Text:
这是我们达成的第一个成就！
对了，别忘记领取奖励！

40000612.English_Text: You should check your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Journal</> often for any <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Goals</> you've completed.
40000612.Chinese_Text:
一定要经常查看
旅程中达成的成就！

40000613.Original_Text: 뭐? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여정</>이란 거 어떤 거냐고?\n좋아, 이 참에 같이 설명해 줄게!
40000613.English_Text: Huh? You don't' know about your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Journal</>? Okay, I'll explain that to you, too.
40000613.Chinese_Text:
什么？你问什么是旅程？
好，趁这个机会给你好好说明一下！

40000614.English_Text: It contains the record of our journey together.
40000614.Chinese_Text:
这里会记录
我们的旅途。

40000615.Original_Text: 진행 중이거나, 수행할 수 있는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>들을 확인하거나
40000615.English_Text: Here, you can check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quests</> you're currently doing or that are available.
40000615.Chinese_Text:
查看进行中的或
可以进行的任务，

40000616.Original_Text: 그 임무의 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>목표</>를 볼 수 있어.\n이봐, 내 말 듣고 있지?
40000616.English_Text: You can also check their <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>objectives</>. Hey, are you listening to me?
40000616.Chinese_Text:
也可以查看任务的目标。
喂，你有没有在听我说话？

40000617.Original_Text: 좋아. 설명은\n이 정도면 될 것 같네.\n그럼 이따 보자!
40000617.English_Text: All right, that's all for my explanation. Now, I'll see you later!
40000617.Chinese_Text:
最后点击这里，
就可以在地图查看
你的任务信息。

40000618.Original_Text: 자, 본냥과 함께\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소울</> 구매가 가능한\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>상점</>을 함께 둘러보자냥~!
40000618.English_Text: Now, let's take a look around the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Shop</> where you can buy <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Souls</>, meow!
40000618.Chinese_Text:
好，跟本喵一起去逛一下
可以购买灵魂的商店喵～！

40000619.English_Text: Here, over here! Come on, check this out, purr!
40000619.Chinese_Text:
就是这里喵！！
快点看看喵！

40000621.Original_Text: 흐음, 지금 어울릴만한 게...\n이게 좋겠다냥!\n한번 꾹! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>눌러</>보라냥.
40000621.English_Text: Hm, let's see what you can use... Here, this! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Press</> it, purr.
40000621.Chinese_Text:
唔，现在最好是...
这个喵！
来用力！按一下喵。

40000622.Original_Text: 잠깐, 잠깐, 잠깐이다냥!\n사기 전에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>자세히</> 한번 살펴보라냥!
40000622.English_Text: Wait, wait just a moment, meow! You'd better check its <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>details</> before you buy it.
40000622.Chinese_Text:
等等，等等，等等喵！
购买之前一定要仔细查看喵！

40000623.English_Text: Make sure to read <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>all the precautions</>, purr.
40000623.Chinese_Text:
尤其是一定要仔细查看
注意事项喵！

40000624.Original_Text: 자~ 다 읽었으면 이제\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소울</>을 만나러 가자냥!
40000624.English_Text: Okay, are you done reading? Then, let's go meet a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</>, mrrow!
40000624.Chinese_Text:
好～读完之后
去见灵魂喵！

40000625.English_Text: Now, press <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Buy</> and meet a new Soul!
40000625.Chinese_Text:
好，最后点击购买
获得灵魂吧喵～！

40000626.English_Text: Let's find out what kind of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</> you've summoned, purr!
40000626.Chinese_Text: 我们来看一下召唤出了什么灵魂喵！

40000628.Original_Text: 바로 요기! 요 아래에서,\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소울</>들을 확인할 수 있다냥!
40000628.English_Text: There they are, purr! You can check your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Souls</> right here!
40000628.Chinese_Text:
就是这里！在这下面，
可以查看灵魂喵！

40000629.English_Text: Let me tell you more, meow. Open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Map</>.
40000629.Chinese_Text:
我再仔细说明一下喵！
打开地图喵～

40000630.Original_Text: 모험을 통해 지역 곳곳에 있는\n다양한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>발견</>을 할 수 있다냥!\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>모험가 등급</>도 오르지냥!
40000630.English_Text: By going on adventures, you can make <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>various discoveries</> here and there. That'll also raise your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Adventurer Grade</>, meow!
40000630.Chinese_Text:
通过冒险可以在各地
发现各种新事物喵！
同时还能提升冒险家等级喵！

40000631.Chinese_Text: 看到这里的水月广场喵？

40000632.Original_Text: 여기를 누르면 선택한 곳으로,\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>축지</>를 해서 이동할 수 있다냥!
40000632.English_Text: Press here, and you can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>windstride</> to get there!
40000632.Chinese_Text:
点击这里即可通过遁地
移动至选择的地方喵！

40000634.Original_Text: 방금 받은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>수호령 소환서</>를 써보자냥!\n자, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소지품</>을 열어 보라냥~
40000634.English_Text: Let's try out the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Patron Scroll</> you just got, purr. Open your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag</>.
40000634.Chinese_Text:
使用刚刚获得的守护灵召唤书喵！
打开包裹喵～

40000636.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소환서</>를 눌러\n사용해 보자냥~\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>두 번</> 눌러야 한다냥! 두 번!
40000636.English_Text: Press the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Scroll</> to use it. Press it <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>twice</>. Got it? Twice!
40000636.Chinese_Text:
点击召唤书即可使用喵～
需要双击喵！双击！

40000637.Original_Text: 자, 잠깐냥!\n방금 획득한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>수호령</>을\n확인해 봐야 하지 않겠냥?
40000637.English_Text: Wait! Don't you want to check out the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Patron</> you just got, meow?
40000637.Chinese_Text:
等，等等喵！不需要查看
刚刚获得的守护灵喵？

40000638.English_Text: If you want to meet your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Patron</>, remember to come here, purr.
40000638.Chinese_Text:
想看守护灵就记住
这里！这里喵。

40000640.English_Text: Tap here to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Summon</> or <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Remove</> a Patron!
40000640.Chinese_Text:
点击这里可以
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>召唤</>或<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>取消</>守护灵!

40000641.Original_Text: 이봐, 자네! 제대로 보고 있는 거야?!
40000641.English_Text: Hey, where are you looking at?

40000642.English_Text: I told you to check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Chivalry Quest Board</>.

40000644.Original_Text: 의뢰를 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>수락</>하면 \n바로 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>를 할 수 있지.\n정말 쉽고 간단하지 않나?
40000644.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Accept</> a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quest</>, and you can get on with it right away. Easy, isn't it?
40000644.Chinese_Text:
一旦接受委托
即可进行任务。
是不是很轻松，很简单？

40000645.Original_Text: (일단 준비를 좀 해야겠어.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>귀환의 돌</>을 사용해서\n마을에 들러볼까?)
40000645.English_Text: (I'd better get ready first. Should I use a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Return Stone</> and drop by a village?)
40000645.Chinese_Text:
（先做点准备吧。
使用归还石
回到村庄吧。）

40000647.English_Text: (All right, I've found a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Return Stone</>! I should select it.)
40000647.Chinese_Text:
（很好，找到了归还石！
来选择一下。）

40000648.English_Text: (By using a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Return Stone</>, I can go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>New Fishbelly Pub</> from here.)
40000648.Chinese_Text:
（使用归还石
即可从这里移动至新大鱼坊总舵。）

40000649.Original_Text: 그래도 꽉 차면 어떻게 하냐구요?\n자, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소지품</>을 열어보시면요~
40000649.English_Text: What do you do if your bag still gets full? All right, open your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>inventory</>,
40000649.Chinese_Text:
什么？还是很满该怎么办？
来，打开一下包裹～

40000650.Original_Text: 여기 이렇게 소지품 공간을\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>확장</>할 수 있거든요!
40000650.English_Text: and you can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>expand</> its space like this.
40000650.Chinese_Text:
在这里可以
扩张包裹空间！

40000651.Original_Text: 아쉽지만 공짜는 아니예요!\n어느 정도는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금화</>로 확장 할 수 있죠.
40000651.English_Text: Unfortunately, you can't do it for free. You can, however, expand it with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gold</> to a certain extent.
40000651.Chinese_Text:
很可惜，这不是免费！
使用金币即可扩张一些空间。

40000652.English_Text: Or you could leave it to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Storage Keeper</>. Try using it.
40000652.Chinese_Text:
或者也可以交给
物流管理员保管。
请尝试一下。

40000653.Original_Text: 잠깐, 가기 전에\n하나 알려줄 게 있어.
40000653.English_Text: Wait, let me tell you something before you go.
40000653.Chinese_Text: （礼物包括服装选择箱与装备图鉴使用书。）

40000655.Original_Text: 획득한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>장비</>를\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>장비도감</>에 등록하면\n이로운 효과를 얻을 수 있어.
40000655.English_Text: Register <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>gear</> you found in the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gear Codex</>, and you can get some beneficial effects.
40000655.Chinese_Text:
（在装备图鉴登记装备
即可获得增益效果。）

40000656.Original_Text: 장비는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>상점</>이나\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거래소</>에서도 살 수 있어!\n잊지 말고 기억해 둬!
40000656.English_Text: You can also buy gear at the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Shop</> and the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Market</>. You'd better not forget that.
40000656.Chinese_Text: （在这里可以查看获得的效果。）

40000658.Original_Text: 저와 같은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>물류관리인</>을 만나시면\n이렇게 말을 걸어 보세요.
40000658.English_Text: If you see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Storage Keeper</> like me, you should speak to them like this.
40000658.Chinese_Text:
遇到像我这样的物流管理员时，
可以跟对方说话。

40000659.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> merchants are here to help you keep your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>items</> safe.
40000659.Chinese_Text:
桃花商廛会
安全地保管
顾客的重要物品。

40000660.Original_Text: 맡기신 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>물품</>은 언제든 \n되찾아 가실 수 있으니,\n안심하고 맡겨주세요.
40000660.English_Text: Feel free to leave <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>items</> with us and pick them back up anytime you want.
40000660.Chinese_Text:
顾客可随时
取走保管的物品，
请放心保管。

40000661.Original_Text: 저와 같은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>상인</>을 만나시면\n이렇게 말을 걸어 보십시오.
40000661.English_Text: If you see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>merchants</> like me, you should speak to them like this.
40000661.Chinese_Text:
遇到像我这样的商人时，
可以跟对方说话。

40000662.Original_Text: 그럼 이렇게\n상인들이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>판매</>하는 품목을\n한눈에 보실 수 있습니다.
40000662.English_Text: Then, you'll see their <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>sale list</> at a glance like this.
40000662.Chinese_Text:
在这里可
一眼查看
商人出售的商品。

40000663.Original_Text: (다 둘러본 것 같다.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>이 있는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>드러난 유적지</>로 이동하자)
40000663.English_Text: (I've seen everything I can. Let's go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Barren Ruins</> where <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</> is.)
40000663.Chinese_Text:
（大致看完了。
去饿狼所在的显露的遗址吧。）

40000664.English_Text: You can also check available hunting grounds on the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Map</> like this.
40000664.Chinese_Text: 在地图可以看到狩猎区喵。

40000666.English_Text: I'll give you this. Open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag window</>, meow.
40000666.Chinese_Text:
请获得该秘诀，
使武功得到成长。

40000667.Original_Text: 참, 저희는 상점도 운영 중입니다. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>무공서 상인</>과 대화해보세요.
40000667.English_Text: By the way, we also run a shop. Talk to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Basic Technique Tome Merchant</>.
40000667.Chinese_Text: 对了，我们还经营商店。请与基础武功书商人对话。

40000668.English_Text: Hurry up and drink it, meow! You'll feel your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade Chi</> increase!
40000668.Chinese_Text: 每一种武功都有记载武功秘诀的物品。

40000672.English_Text: Press the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>technique</> for which you want to use the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Essence</>.
40000672.Chinese_Text:
请长按
想要使用精髓的武功。

40000673.English_Text: The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Essence</> I just gave you can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>amplify</> the technique you've selected.
40000673.Chinese_Text:
使用刚才给你的精髓
可增幅选择的武功。

40000674.English_Text: Now, use the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Amplify Essence</> and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>amplify</> the technique.
40000674.Chinese_Text:
请注入增幅精髓
以增幅武功。

40000677.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>노이</>의 비옥을 통해서\n얻은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>기억</>들 말이야.\n어디에 보이는지 알고 있어?
40000677.English_Text: The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>memories</> obtained from <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noi</>'s Caelite. Do you know where they can be seen?
40000677.Chinese_Text:
你知道在那里可查看
通过䛝怡的閟玉
获得的记忆吗？

40000678.Original_Text: 바로 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>사가</>야.\n이미 찾은 기억들은 물론\n찾아야 할 것들도 모여 있어.
40000678.English_Text:
In the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Saga</>. The memories which we've found,
as well as the ones we need to find, are all there.
40000678.Chinese_Text:
那就是萨迦。
不仅有已经找到的回忆，
还有今后需要寻找的记忆。

40000679.English_Text: See all these <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>memories</>? Okay, pick one.
40000679.Chinese_Text:
看到了吗？这么多的记忆？
来，选择一个。

40000680.English_Text: We'll obtain the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Memory Shards</> from <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tomo</> and visit all those places!
40000680.Chinese_Text:
从土毛身上
获取记忆碎片，
逐一寻找吧！

40000681.English_Text: You don't know your worth yet.

40000682.English_Text: All right, then I'd better introduce you to the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Rank System</>. Let's open <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Rank</>, shall we?
40000682.Chinese_Text:
我来为你
介绍一下排名吧～！
打开排名吧！

40000683.Chinese_Text:
看到了吗？
少侠的经验值排名。

40000684.Original_Text: 그리고 여기에서는 무림강자들의 \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>순위</>와 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>혜택</>을 볼 수 있죠.
40000684.English_Text: And here, you can check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>top players</> and the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>benefits</> that they receive.
40000684.Chinese_Text:
在这里可以看到
武林强者们的排名与福利。

40000685.Original_Text: 이런 강자들과 여정을\n함께하면 든든하겠죠?\n그럴 줄 알고 제가…
40000685.English_Text: It'd be great to journey with such strong companions, wouldn't it? I knew you'd say that!
40000685.Chinese_Text:
若能跟这些强者一起冒险，
是不是很可靠呢？
我也知道，所以...

40000686.English_Text: How about I introduce you to the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Clan System</> as well?
40000686.Chinese_Text:
接下来要为少侠
介绍一下门派～

40000687.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>문파</>에 대해 들어보신 적 있나요?\n여기서 확인하실 수 있어요.
40000687.English_Text: Have you heard of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>clans</>? You can take a look at them here.
40000687.Chinese_Text:
听说过门派吗？
在此处可以查看。

40000688.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>문파</>를 통해 뜻이 같은 자들과\n함께 성장해 나가는 것도 \n좋은 경험이 될 거예요~
40000688.English_Text: I bet it'd be a good experience to join a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>clan</> and grow alongside some like-minded people.
40000688.Chinese_Text:
通过门派与志同道合
的好友们一起成长
也是很重要的经历～

40000689.English_Text: Let me tell you how to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Craft</>.
40000689.Chinese_Text: 我来告诉你如何制作吧。

40000691.Chinese_Text:
在这里
可以进行制作装备。

40000692.English_Text: Since this is your first time, we can start by crafting an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>accessory</>.
40000692.Chinese_Text:
因为是第一次，首先来制作
防具吧。

40000693.English_Text: This <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>accessory</> here looks suitable to craft and equip at your level.
40000693.Chinese_Text:
看来这个防具
很适合
制作及穿戴。

40000694.English_Text: Are you ready to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>craft</> your first accessory?
40000694.Chinese_Text:
准备好了吗？
来制作少侠的第一个防具吧。

40000695.English_Text: Now, you just wait for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>crafting</> process to be completed.
40000695.Chinese_Text:
不要着急，再稍微等待
就能完成制作。

40000696.English_Text: Wow, good job! This is how you do it. Keep it up.
40000696.Chinese_Text:
哇，做得很不错！
今后也只要像今天一样
制作即可。

40000697.English_Text: All right, while you're here, how'd you like to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>enhance</> your gear?
40000697.Chinese_Text:
好，那么顺便
进行强化吧。

40000699.English_Text: Press and hold the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>armor</> I just gave you.
40000699.Chinese_Text:
请长按刚才
给你的防具。

40000700.English_Text: You can press here to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance</> it,

40000701.English_Text: but first, you have to have an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance Scroll</>.
40000701.Chinese_Text:
您需要持有
强化所需的强化卷轴。

40000702.English_Text: I'll let you use <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>this one</> for now.
40000702.Chinese_Text:
先来使用
我给的卷轴吧。

40000704.English_Text: and then press <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance</>. Not hard at all, right?
40000704.Chinese_Text:
然后即可尝试强化。
怎么样？不难吧？

40000705.English_Text: Haha! You've made it! I guess you've got a knack for this.
40000705.Chinese_Text:
哈哈！强化成功了！
你很有才能哦？！

40000706.English_Text: You're pretty good with your hands. I might as well teach you how to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Salvage</>.
40000706.Chinese_Text:
你的技艺不错，
最后再告诉你
分解。

40000708.English_Text: Press and hold the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>armor</> you just enhanced to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Salvage</>.
40000708.Chinese_Text:
请长按刚才强化的防具，
然后进行分解。

40000709.English_Text: You don't want to waste it? Haha! Don't worry.
40000709.Chinese_Text: 觉得可惜？哈哈！请不要担心。

40000710.English_Text: Utilize <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Salvaging</> often! You can obtain <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>items</> that way, too.
40000710.Chinese_Text:
通过分解
也可以获得道具，
请妥善利用。

40000712.English_Text: How is it? Do you feel different, meow?

40000714.English_Text: You can check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade Chi</> you acquired here!
40000714.Chinese_Text: 喝下功力水即可获得功力喵！

40000715.English_Text: With <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade Chi</>, you can increase your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade</>'s <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>level</>, meow.
40000715.Chinese_Text: 利用获得的功力可提升剑诀的阶段喵！是不是很厉害喵~？

40000716.Original_Text: 그리고 각 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검결</>은\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>효과</>가 다 다르다냥!\n이걸 한번 눌러보겠냥?
40000716.English_Text: Each <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade</> has a different <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>effect</>, meow! Try pressing this.
40000716.Chinese_Text: 在这里可查看各阶段剑诀提供的效果喵！

40000720.Chinese_Text:
这～里！
看到了剑诀喵？

40000721.English_Text: Lastly, if you press here, you can turn <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade</> on and off!
40000721.Chinese_Text:
点击这里即可
启用或关闭剑诀喵！
来打开一下喵！

40000722.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검결</>을 켜면\n공격할 때마다 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>공력옥</>이 소모되는 거 잊지 말라냥!
40000722.English_Text: Don't forget that attacking with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade</> activated requires <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Chi Orbs</>, meow!
40000722.Chinese_Text: 以后攻击时会发动剑诀喵！不要忘记会消耗功力玉喵！

40000724.English_Text: (I've acquired a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Technique Tome</>. I should open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag window</>.)
40000724.Chinese_Text:
（获得了武功书。
打开包裹窗。）

40000727.English_Text: (Press <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Learn</> to learn the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>technique</> written in the scroll.)
40000727.Chinese_Text: （点击登记，学习武功书上的武功。）

40000731.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Slide it down</> to use the technique <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>automatically</>.)
40000731.Chinese_Text: （向下拖动快捷栏位，即可自动使用登记的武功。）

40000732.Chinese_Text: （点击这里即可关闭武功窗口。）

40000733.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>를 받을 수 있는\n다른 방법이 있다는\n사실을 알고 계십니까?
40000733.English_Text: Did you know there's another way to get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quests</>?
40000733.Chinese_Text:
你知道还有
其他接受任务
的方法吗？

40000734.Original_Text: 여기를 누르면\n소협의 도움이 필요한\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>들을 볼 수 있습니다.
40000734.English_Text: Press here, and you can see the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quests</> that you can complete.
40000734.Chinese_Text:
点击此处
可查看需要少侠帮助的
任务。

40000735.Original_Text: 수행 가능한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>들은\n이곳에 표시가 되는데,\n마침 여기 하나 있군요.
40000735.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Quests</> that are available for you will be displayed here. Ah, here's one.
40000735.Chinese_Text:
此处会显示
可进行的任务，
现在正好有一个。

40000736.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>를 선택하면\n해당 임무에 대한\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>상세 정보</>를 볼 수 있습니다.
40000736.English_Text: Select the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quest</>, and you can see <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>its details</>.
40000736.Chinese_Text:
选择任务
可查看该任务的
详细信息。

40000737.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>수락 위치</>로 자동으로\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>이동</>할 수도 있으니\n꼭 활용해 보십시오.
40000737.English_Text: You can also <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>auto-move</> to the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quest location</>. Make good use of it.
40000737.Chinese_Text:
也可以自动移动至
接受任务的位置，
一定要妥善利用。

40000738.Original_Text: 나 실은 다른 부탁이\n하나 더 있는데 말이야.\n그 전에 알려줄 게 있어.
40000738.English_Text: Actually, I have another favor. But I have to tell you something.
40000738.Chinese_Text:
其实我还有
另外一个请求。
在那之前再告诉你一件事。

40000739.Original_Text: 앞으로 나처럼 부탁하는\n사람들이 생기면,\n여기에 표시가 될 거야.
40000739.English_Text: If there are people who make a request like I did, it will be marked here.
40000739.Chinese_Text:
以后再遇到像我这样
有事相求的人时，
会在这里显示。

40000740.Original_Text: 받을 수 있는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>들은\n여기 보이게 될 텐데,\n먼저 내 부탁을 봐줄래?
40000740.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Quests</> that are available for you will be displayed here. Could you check mine first?
40000740.Chinese_Text:
在这里能够
查看可接受的
任务目录。

40000741.Original_Text: 지금의 네가 수행할 만한\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>인지는 여기를 보고\n잘 참고하도록 해.
40000741.English_Text: Check here to see if a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quest</> is suitable for you to take on right now.
40000741.Chinese_Text:
参考此处，
选择适合你的
任务吧。

40000742.Original_Text: 혹시 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비결</>에 대해 아십니까?\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>무공</>을 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>강화</>할 수 있는\n물품으로 알려져 있습니다.
40000742.English_Text: Have you heard about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Oracle</>? It's said to be an item that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>enhances</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>techniques</>.

40000746.English_Text: Then, you can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>inject</> the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Oracle</> like this.
40000746.Chinese_Text:
然后,在这里您可以使用
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 秘密</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 注入</>,或<textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 进化</> 用于
 武术.

40000747.Original_Text: 원하는 무공의 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비결</>을 얻어\n무공을 성장해 나가시길 바랍니다.
40000747.English_Text: I hope you get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Oracles</> for the techniques you want and develop your techniques.
40000747.Chinese_Text:
我希望你得到你想要的武术的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>秘密</>并成长
武术.

40000748.English_Text: Do you know the way to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>labyrinth</>?
40000748.Chinese_Text: 你知道通往小峡谷<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>迷宫</>的路吗?

40000749.Original_Text: 하핫, 제가 알려 드리겠습니다.\n여기를 눌러 보시면,
40000749.English_Text: Haha, I'll teach you. Just press here.
40000749.Chinese_Text:
哈哈,我会告诉你的.
如果你点击这里,

40000751.Original_Text: 자, 여기가 그 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>미궁</>입니다.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>축지</>로 바로 이동 가능하니,\n편하게 이용해 보십시오.
40000751.English_Text: Now, this is the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>labyrinth</>. You can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Windstride</> there right away, so use it at your leisure.
40000751.Chinese_Text:
现在是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>迷宫</>,可以直接移动到
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>中地</>,请放心使用
.

40000752.English_Text: (I've received an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>outfit</> as a cheering gift! I should open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag</>.)
40000752.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>我们收到了服装</>作为支持礼物!让我们打开
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>财物</>)

40000753.Chinese_Text:
(这里!这是我作为礼物收到的
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>服装</>)

40000756.English_Text: (Hmm... This is good! I should hurry up and open it.)
40000756.Chinese_Text:
(嗯……我喜欢这个!
现在打开它)

40000757.English_Text: (Should I try on the outfit in the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Wardrobe</>?)
40000757.Chinese_Text:
(要不要试穿一下在
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>衣橱</>里挑选的衣服?)

40000761.Original_Text: 어때? 잘 이해됐지?\n그렇다면 여기를 눌러서\n내 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>부탁</>을 좀 들어줄래?
40000761.English_Text: Say, do you get it now? Then, could you press here and accept my <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>request</>?
40000761.Chinese_Text:
如何?你明白了吗?
如果是这样,你想通过点击这里听到
我的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>要求</>吗?

40000762.English_Text: (Should I <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>equip</> the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>gear</> that I just got? First, open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag</>.)

40000763.Chinese_Text: (让我们通过按<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>设备两次</>装备它)

40000764.English_Text: (Should I <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>equip</> the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>gear</> that I just got? First, open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag</>.)

40000765.Chinese_Text: (让我们通过按<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>设备两次</>安装它)

40000766.Chinese_Text:
(你想通过点击这里做
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> Teleport</>吗?)

40000771.English_Text:
(and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>evolve</> the technique.
I should try it.)
40000771.Chinese_Text:
(我可以<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>进化</>武功.
来试试吧)

40000774.English_Text: (Now's the time for my match! I'd better prepare some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Swift Pills</>. Open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag</>.)
40000774.Chinese_Text:
(现在真的是比赛开始了!
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> Youngsindan </> 我们要不要准备好?
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 我们打开随身物品</>)

40000776.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Press</> here to register them in a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Quick Slot</>.)

40000778.English_Text: (Why don't I make some preparations before I go down?)
40000778.Chinese_Text: (啊!你有没有早点得到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>巴尔巴里之魂</>?)

40000779.Chinese_Text:
(下山前要不要在
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>武器</>上尝试<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>装备</>?
点击这里)

40000783.English_Text: (I should press the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bulbari</> and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>equip</> the Soul.)

40000784.Original_Text: 참! 새로운 사냥터에 왔으니,\n이 지역을 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>탐사</>해 보는 건 어때?\n여기를 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>눌러</> 시작해봐.
40000784.English_Text: Oh, right—now that you're in a new hunting ground, how'd you like to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>explore</> it? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Press</> here to start.
40000784.Chinese_Text:
真的!既然来到了新的狩猎场,那么
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 探索一下这个区域怎么样?

40000785.English_Text: By <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>exploring</>, you can also get a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>reward</>, like this! It's like killing two birds with one stone, right?
40000785.Chinese_Text:
进行<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>探索</>,还可以这样获得<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>奖励</>!
怎么样?一块石头还是两块石头?

40000786.Original_Text: 저기 저 녀석들은\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>새총</>을 들고 있는 것 같은데?\n한 번 살펴봐.
40000786.English_Text: Those guys look like they're carrying <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>slingshots</>. Why don't you go check them out?
40000786.Chinese_Text:
我觉得那边的那些人拿着
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>弹弓</>?
看一看.

40000787.English_Text: Make sure to pick up your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>reward</> whenever it's available. Don't forget!
40000787.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>补偿</>是必须的,
从现在开始不要忘记!

40000788.Original_Text: 좋아, 이 정도로 마무리하자.\n다시 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여정</>을 시작해 볼까?
40000788.English_Text: All right, this should be good enough. Shall we continue on our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>journey</>?
40000788.Chinese_Text:
好了,到此为止吧.再从
开始<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>旅程</>?

40000790.English_Text: Could you press here and accept my <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>request</>?
40000790.Chinese_Text:
点击这里同意
我的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>请求</>?

40000791.English_Text: By pressing <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Accept</>, you can proceed with the quest.
40000791.Chinese_Text:
点击<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>接受</>,即可继续
任务!

40000792.English_Text: (The next <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>destination</> is a bit far away from here.)
40000792.Chinese_Text: (距离下一个 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 目标点 </> 有一段距离)

40000793.Chinese_Text:
“（现在，让我们将 
 移到 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Abyssal Rift</>？）”

40000796.Original_Text: 참, 어디로 가셔야 할지 모르시겠다면 지도를 열어보십시오.
40000796.English_Text: Well, if you don't know where to go, just open the map.
40000796.Chinese_Text: 嗯，如果你不知道去哪里，那就打开地图吧。

40000797.Original_Text: 이렇게 지맥이 닫혀 있는 지역이 보이실 겁니다.
40000797.English_Text: You will see an area where the leylines are closed like this.
40000797.Chinese_Text: 你会看到一个地脉像这样封闭的区域。

40000798.Original_Text: 보시다시피 축지도 사용할 수 없죠. 지맥을 열기 위해선,
40000798.English_Text: As you can see, you can't use the axis. To open the ley,
40000798.Chinese_Text: 如你所见，你不能使用轴。要打开地雷，

40000799.English_Text: You just need to carry out the nearby pioneering quests.
40000799.Chinese_Text: 你只需要执行附近的开拓任务。

40000800.Original_Text: 해룡산맥 곳곳에 지맥이 닫힌 지역을 찾아 해결해 주십시오
40000800.English_Text: Please find and solve the areas where the lei is closed in various places in the Haeryong Mountains.
40000800.Chinese_Text: 请在海龙山各处，找出林雷封闭的区域，并解决。

40000804.Original_Text: 한 번 더 누르면\n상자에 넣을 수 있다냥.
40000804.English_Text: If you press it once more, you can put it in the \n box.
40000804.Chinese_Text: 再按一次，就可以把它放进\n框里了。

40000805.English_Text: This time, it's your turn to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spirit Stone</>!

40000806.English_Text: If you insert <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spellstone</>, \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Available Stats</> is shown here\n!
40000806.Chinese_Text: 如果您插入 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spellstone</>，\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Available Stats</> 会显示在此处\n！

40000808.Chinese_Text: 最后，让我们将 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spelstone</> 添加到 \n。

40000809.English_Text: Depending on the combination of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spellstone</>, you can get \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>additional stats</>!
40000809.Chinese_Text: 根据<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>法术石</>的组合，你可以获得\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>额外的统计数据</>！

40000811.English_Text: The way to leave as a recovered time line is simple.
40000811.Chinese_Text: 作为恢复的时间线离开的方式很简单。

40000812.Original_Text: 이 길을 통해 언제든\n회복된 시간선으로\n떠날 수 있을 거야.
40000812.English_Text: You'll be able to leave with the time line at any time through this road.
40000812.Chinese_Text: 您将能够在这条道路随时与时间线一起离开。

40000813.Original_Text: 처음처럼 쉽지는\n않을 테니, 함께 할\n동료들을 찾아봐.
40000813.English_Text: I will not be as easy as the beginning \n Look for \n colleagues to do with it.
40000813.Chinese_Text: 我不会像开始\n同事一样容易。

40000814.English_Text: I can not be able to do it alone.

40000816.English_Text: To use <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>drawn </> to use <textcolor = [255: 204: 102: 255]> to use </> again <textcolor = [255: 204: 102: 255]>

40000820.English_Text: If you do not follow the spirit straight and do not follow \n \n
40000820.Chinese_Text: 如果你不直接遵循精神，请不要关注\n \n

40000821.English_Text: \n The way to go to the top is more than I thought \n is simple
40000821.Chinese_Text: \n去顶部的方式比我想象的要简单

40000822.English_Text: I see the top of the author of \n Permea to choose \n
40000822.Chinese_Text: 我看到\n permea作者的顶部选择\n

40000823.Original_Text: 먼저 네 녀석에게\n딱 맞는 층부터\n찾아보는 게 좋을 거다냥~
40000823.English_Text: First, I would like to see you from the fierce of yourself.
40000823.Chinese_Text: 首先，我想从自己的凶猛中看到你。

40000824.Original_Text: 맞습니다냥. 본인의\n실력과 각 층의 수준을\n비교해서 도전하십시오냥
40000824.English_Text: Catch it. Compare yourself and the level of each floor
40000824.Chinese_Text: 抓住它。比较自己和每个楼层的水平

40000825.Original_Text: 뭐, 언젠가는 최상층에\n오를 수 있을지도냥~?\n잘 해보라냥!
40000825.English_Text: Well, someday you can go to the top floor, is it? \n Good to you!
40000825.Chinese_Text: 好吧，有一天你可以去顶层，是吗？ \n对你好！
